GSD.description:
vboxguest: Do not use devm for irq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit e5cd88146e7907f577d70dd0c64fd8cd78b2a3f9. For more details please see the references link.
